title: [Mateius's Combat Gear]
[Mateius's Weaponry]
[Mateius's Armory]
description: The broad sweep of the hardwood floor is interrupted by a brass flowerpot.  Halfway to the textured ceiling, a blue watered silk tapestry hangs on one of the varnished ebonwood walls.  A gilded maple table and a glass-topped mistwood counter are pushed close together in the back of the shop.
